name: Fuzzy Information Retrieval System
short_description:
A Computer Supported Learning System to Help Teachers to Teach Fuzzy Information Retrieval Systems.

More information:

+ E. Herrera-Viedma, A.G. López-Herrera, S. Alonso, J.M. Moreno, F.J. Cabrerizo, C. Porcel, A Computer-Supported Learning System to Help Teachers to Teach Fuzzy Information Retrieval Systems. Information Retrieval, 12:2 (2009) 179–200 doi:10.1007/s10791-008-9087-3.

+ J.M. Moreno, E. Herrera-Viedma, A.G. López-Herrera, S. Alonso, F.J. Cabrerizo, C. Porcel, Application of a Student-Oriented Software Tool to Improve the Learning of FIRS. International Conference on Education and New Learning Technologies (EDULEARN 09), Barcelona (Spain), 2524-2532, 6-8 July 2009.

+ E. Herrera-Viedma, S. Alonso, F.J. Cabrerizo, A.G. López-Herrera, C. Porcel, A Software Tool to Teach the Performance of FIRS based on Weighted Queries. Proceedings of First International Workshop on Teaching and Learning of Information Retrieval (TLIR 2007), London (UK), 25-31, January 2007.
summary: A learning system  to teach fuzzy Information retrieval systems
